text: The BYD Shark is a mid-size Plug-in hybrid Pickup truck made by BYD since 2024. == History and Features == In April 2024 BYD said it would be naming its first Pickup truck "Shark". it was launched in Mexico in May its the first time a BYD vehicle debuts outside China. it has the DMO Super Hybrid plataform and shares it with the Fangchengbao Bao 5. It has a 1.5 liter turbocharged petrol engine combined with two electric motors in each axle this creates a electric four-wheel drive layout with a total power of 429 hp (320 kW). while the Pickup Truck has a E-CVT transmission. == Markets == The BYD Shark is currently sold in Mexico. Brazil. Australia New Zealand. and Laos (where in these three places its sold as the BYD Shark 6) its not sold in China. == References == Shark Category:2020s automobiles Category:Trucks Category:Pickup trucks Category:Chinese automobiles
